name: Awful Green Mafia
description:
This is a game where you are able to take everything in the environment and beat your enemies using it. You have to pass three floors with lots of enemies and objects. In the end of each floor you can get a medicine.

Controls:

  • A,D or arrows -  to move
  • Spacebar - to jump
  • E - interact/ take objects/ use medicines/ open doors
  • LMB - to hit with object in your hand
  • RMB - to throw object
  • Esc - open menu

Have fun!
